meta.@content: Sail of 688 Submarine with masts up
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

field.@appinfo: Displayed subscene positioned as a HUD.
Additional HUD geometry which can be touched and dragged for repositioning. If this geometry goes offscreen (perhaps due to screen resizing) then it snaps back to original position.
Modified screen location and distance (for size).
